mapper.insert: insert into attendance_table(numId, memberName, memberDept, memberPosition, memberJoinDate, attendanceDate, absenceDate, lateDate) values(#{numId}, #{memberName}, #{memberDept}, #{memberPosition}, #{memberJoinDate}, #{attendanceDate}, #{absenceDate}, #{lateDate})
mapper.select: select attendanceDate from attendance_table where numId=#{numId} and str_to_date(attendanceDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = current_date
select * from attendance_table where numId=#{id} and str_to_date(attendanceDate, '%Y-%m-%d') = current_date
mapper.update: update attendance_table set closingDate=#{closingDate}, earlyDate=#{earlyDate} where id=#{id}
